alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 30 at 3:03AM EDT until October 31 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing low temperatures ranging from 29 to 31 degrees expected at higher elevations. Areas of frost will develop in sheltered valleys as well. * WHERE...Carbon and Monroe. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 9 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sub-freezing temperatures are expected to occur again Tuesday night. A hard freeze expected to occur Wednesday night with temperatures as low as 25 degrees.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
